Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form

Could you please confirm if there's an endpoint available to fetch the list of supported locations (cities/states) for campaign targeting?
We want to ensure the options shown in our UI are aligned with Newsbreak's latest location targeting capabilities.

If the endpoint exists, please share the schema or example response as well.

I'm sorry, but I don't have information on an endpoint for fetching the list of supported locations for campaign targeting. For the most accurate and up-to-date details, I recommend reaching out to our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com. They'll be able to provide you with the necessary information.

Ad rejection reasons can vary, but you'll receive an email from Ad Support with the specific reason for your ad's rejection. It could be due to issues like incorrect conversion tracking setup or typographical errors. I recommend checking your email for details on the rejection and reviewing the advertising policy before resubmitting your ad. You can find more information here: [My ad got rejected. What's next?](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18085960681101-My-ad-got-rejected-What-s-next). If you believe the rejection was a mistake, you can appeal by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com.
